summary: Lightweight Piper engine wrapper used by the voice renderer.

top_level_symbols.name: PiperEngine
top_level_symbols.doc:
Minimal interface to the `piper` TTS engine. The implementation intentionally keeps features to a bare minimum for unit
testing.

top_level_symbols.name: _resample_audio
top_level_symbols.doc: Resample y from sr_in to sr_out using high-quality polyphase if available. Falls back to linear interpolation when SciPy is unavailable.
